title: The meditator
body:
This is a rough idea for a champion

Mage / support (zyra/ morgana / karma)
Ranged auto attacks
Uses mana

When non near any enemy champions regenerates health and takes less damage. When an enemy damage enters that field gains a short burst of movement speed. right can only activate every few seconds. Surrounding allies have the same effects in the barrier (needs rework)

Q - a target / skill shot ability which slows an enemy dealing magic damage

If a q hits an enemy twice they are snared. (slows stack)

surrounding friendly champions have their movement speed increased ( effects self)

W - An enemy damaged and marked to do less damage
 
if w hits an enemy twice the enemy is pacified (blinded and silenced)

In addition nearby allies are sheilded

E - skill shot / target ability which shreds an enemies armour and magic resist % per 100 ap

If E is cast twice the enemy receives a mark which can be detonated dealing % max health to the target. (Shreds stack)

Additionally nearby friendly champions damage amplified.

R -  gives him a free cast of an ability. If the same ability strikes a target before the others effect is completed surrounded friendly champions are healed and additional effect occurs.

The cool down applies to individual abilities caster twice. The same ability will not be free to cast for the cool downs duration.

please give your feedback below.
I did not include scalings cool downs ect as it is hard to balance in the game.
